title: Replace app logo with the user-provided emblem

requirements.text: Create a new square, cleanly-cropped school logo image from the user-uploaded photos (IMG_20260208_024007233.jpg and IMG_20260208_024007233-1.jpg) and add it as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: Change the logo to this in the app

acceptanceCriteria: A new logo file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/pkm-school-logo-2026.dim_512x512.png.
The logo has a square aspect ratio, is tightly cropped around the circular emblem, and has good contrast/sharpness suitable for UI display.
The logo renders correctly when loaded directly via the browser at /assets/generated/pkm-school-logo-2026.dim_512x512.png (no 404).

requirements.text: Update the centralized branding configuration to use the new logo asset path, and ensure all logo render locations (at minimum: sticky header branding and Home screen hero) display the new logo via the branding constant.

quotes: Change the logo to this in the app

acceptanceCriteria: The Header logo (frontend/src/components/Header.tsx) and Home screen hero logo (frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx) both display the updated logo without layout breakage or distortion.
No other parts of the UI reference the old logo path /assets/generated/pkm-school-logo-v2.dim_512x512.png for the school logo.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them only).

Do not modify immutable frontend hook/provider entry files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Serve the logo as a static frontend asset under frontend/public/assets/generated; do not route image bytes through the backend canister.
nonGoals: Do not change the app theme, layout, navigation, or content beyond the logo swap.
Do not implement any new backend functionality for logo management.

required: Square-cropped school emblem logo based on the uploaded image (pkm-school-logo-2026.dim_512x512.png)
